original_title: Skeleton Key 2: 667 Neighbor of the Beast
overview: Howard and Nicopernicus take a trip back to Nilbog to contend with zombies, vampires, and the dreaded Dr. Nochas in this sequel to Alucard and Shadow Hunters director John Johnson's outrageous horror comedy. There's blood and boobs to spare as the viewer crosses back into the town where nightmares are made, and characters break into song after soiling themselves.
title: Skeleton Key 2: 667 Neighbor of the Beast
